articles.title: Coronavirus particles found in air can spread infection, confirms study - India Today
articles.description: Quantitative evidence showing Covid spreading through coronavirus particles hanging in the air was not available so far. However, the possibility of airborne transmission of Covid has now been confirmed in a study.
